title: User Authentication - Successful Login
description: Verify that users with valid credentials can log in successfully and access role-specific features.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify the user is logged in and redirected to the home dashboard.
Verify user role-based access controls are correctly applied.

title: User Authentication - Failed Login
description: Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is rejected and error message is displayed.

title: Patient Registration with Valid Data
description: Ensure patients can be registered with valid information including unique CPF and all mandatory fields.

steps.description: Navigate to patient registration form.
Fill out patient details with valid name, unique CPF, contact info, and medical history.
Submit the registration form.
Verify patient is successfully registered and appears in patient list.

title: Patient Registration with Duplicate CPF
description: Verify system prevents registration of a patient using an already existing CPF.

steps.description: Navigate to patient registration form.
Fill out patient details using a CPF already registered in the system.
Submit the registration form.
Verify system shows an error and prevents duplicate CPF registration.

title: Patient Search by CPF and Advanced Filters
description: Test advanced search capabilities to find patients based on CPF and other criteria.

steps.description: Open patient list page.
Use search input to query by valid CPF.
Verify patient matching the CPF is shown.
Apply additional filters such as registration date or name.
Verify filtered patient list matches criteria.

title: Appointment Scheduling - Conflict Prevention
description: Ensure appointment cannot be scheduled when a time conflict occurs for the same physiotherapist or patient.

steps.description: Navigate to appointment scheduling page.
Create a new appointment for a physiotherapist at a specific time.
Attempt to create a conflicting appointment at overlapping time for the same physiotherapist or patient.
Verify system blocks scheduling due to conflict and shows relevant message.

title: Appointment Scheduling - Recurring Appointments
description: Validate creation and management of recurring appointments with correct calendar views and notifications.

steps.description: Navigate to appointment scheduling page.
Schedule a recurring appointment with defined frequency.
Verify all occurrences appear correctly on calendar.
Check system sends notifications/reminders for each occurrence.

title: Clinical Documentation - SOAP Notes Editor Functionality
description: Test the SOAP notes module for editing with rich text, auto-save, templates, and version history.

steps.description: Open a patient clinical documentation screen.
Create a new SOAP note using rich text formatting.
Verify the rich text formatting is applied.
Wait and verify auto-save saves the note without manual input.
Use templates to insert predefined text.
Check template text is correctly inserted.
Modify note and verify version history records changes.
Access version history and confirm previous versions can be viewed or restored.

title: AI Assistant - Generate Treatment Suggestions
description: Verify AI assistant provides physiotherapeutic reports, treatment suggestions, and clinical risk analysis within performance constraints.

steps.description: Access AI assistant in clinical documentation.
Request physiotherapeutic report generation for a patient.
Verify report is generated accurately and promptly.
Request treatment protocol suggestions.
Validate suggested treatment protocols are relevant and clinically sound.
Request risk analysis for patient condition.
Confirm returned risk assessments are logical and delivered within acceptable response times.

title: Exercise Library - Prescription and Contraindication Alerts
description: Ensure exercises can be prescribed with embedded media and contraindication alerts are triggered for patient conditions.

steps.description: Browse exercise library by specialty.
Select exercise and view rich media (images, videos) associated.
Verify media displays properly.
Prescribe exercise to a patient considering patient's medical history.
Confirm contraindication alerts appear if patient's condition conflicts with the exercise.
Prescribe exercise with defined difficulty level.
Verify difficulty level is saved and shown in patient prescription.

title: Patient Portal - Secure Login and Data Access
description: Validate secure patient login to portal, ability to view personal clinical data, prescribed exercises, appointments, and communicate with clinic staff.

steps.description: Patient attempts secure login to patient portal with valid credentials.
Verify login success and session initiated.
Navigate to personal data and clinical records.
Ensure data displayed belongs only to logged-in patient.
View prescribed exercises and appointment schedule.
Confirm correct exercises and appointments are visible.
Use communication channel to send a message to clinic.
Verify message is sent and visible to clinic staff.

title: Financial Management - Payment Tracking and Multiple Payment Methods
description: Test correct tracking of payments, generation of revenue reports, delinquency control, and processing of payments including PIX.

steps.description: Record a payment from a patient using PIX.
Verify payment is correctly recorded in system.
Generate revenue report.
Confirm report accurately reflects payment data including recent transactions.
Add a delinquent payment entry and activate delinquency control.
Verify delinquent accounts are flagged and included in alerts.

title: Inventory Management - Stock Control and Alerts
description: Validate stock level management, categorization, alerts for low stock, and history tracking of inventory movements.

steps.description: Access inventory management page.
Record stock entry for equipment or material.
Verify stock levels update accordingly.
Reduce stock below alert threshold.
Check system triggers low-stock alert.
Review inventory movement history.
Confirm all stock changes are logged with timestamps and user info.

title: Task Management - Creation and Progress Tracking
description: Verify task creation, prioritization, progress updates, and notification alerts across roles.

steps.description: Create a new task with priority and description.
Confirm task appears in task list with correct attributes.
Update task progress status.
Verify progress status is updated and visible.
Trigger notification by assigning or updating task.
Confirm relevant users receive notification alerts.

title: Reports and Analytics - Data Accuracy and Export
description: Ensure operational, financial, and clinical metrics are accurate, interactive charts function correctly, and reports export properly.

steps.description: Navigate to reports and analytics dashboard.
View different operational and clinical performance metrics.
Validate metric calculations are correct matching source data.
Interact with charts to filter and drill down data.
Confirm charts update dynamically and reflect filtered data.
Export reports in supported formats (e.g., PDF, CSV).
Verify exported files are correct and complete.

title: System Performance - Load and Response Times
description: Test that system meets load, response time, and availability targets under typical and peak usage scenarios.

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent users accessing patient management, appointment scheduling, and AI assistant features.
Verify response times remain within acceptable limits.
Confirm system availability and stability under load.

title: Security and Data Privacy - Role-based Access and LGPD Compliance
description: Verify users can only access permitted data according to roles and that personal data handling complies with LGPD requirements.

steps.description: Log in as Administrator and access various modules.
Verify full access is granted.
Log in as Physiotherapist and attempt to access restricted partner portal data.
Confirm access is denied.
Log in as Intern and verify read-only access restrictions.
Confirm intern cannot edit patient data.
Test data export and deletion requests to verify LGPD compliant operations.
Confirm personal data is handled according to legal standards.
